Title: Horses
Writer: William Wheeler, Ann Biderman (created by), David Sonnenborn (story editor), Karl Taro Greenfeld (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: While preparing for the opening of Abby's bar, she gets news about the clinical trial. Ray flies to NY to sort things out.
